resources.string: This is example of getting Main View Holder in LinkedListView and customization. In our case changing start paddings for adding from center.
Just simple example of scroll action in LinkedListView.AnimationController. Waiting for onScrollStop and after scrolling to center view.
Max scale which will apply to any center views during scrolling. Set in float and represent value in percentage. Should be components with other settings!
Delta main scale from side to center. Set in float and represent value in percentage. Should be components with other settings too!
